actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow the credit for production of natural gas from certain nonconventional sources only if such natural gas was sold at a lawful price without regard to section 107 and subtitle B of title I of the Natural Gas Policy Act of 1978.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to specify that the income tax credit for the production of natural gas from nonconventional sources shall apply to natural gas sold during the taxable year only if such gas is sold at a lawful price which is determined without regard to ceiling prices under the Natural Gas Policy Act of 1978.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow the credit for production of natural gas from certain nonconventional sources only if such natural gas was sold at a lawful price without regard to section 107 and subtitle B of title I of the Natural Gas Policy Act of 1978.
